revised_title: An Unusual Eruption of Fire from the Ground Near Fierenzola, Italy, and a Hydrostatic Lamp Design
tldr: Dr. Robert St. Clair describes an odd eruption of fire from a spot in the Earth near Fierenzola, Italy, which has been burning continuously for an unknown period. He also proposes a hydrostatic lamp design that keeps the fuel level constant, ensuring a longer burn time.
